description: Bosnian Serb and Serbian units systematically murdered 8,000 Muslims at Srebrenica in July 1995.
title: Bosnia's Srebrenica massacre 25 years on - in pictures
title_page: Bosnia's Srebrenica massacre 25 years on - in pictures - BBC News
maintext: "A concerted effort was made to capture all Muslim men of military age," a judgement against one Bosnian Serb commander read. Buses carrying women and children were systematically search for males, and often troops took young boys and elderly men who would not have been eligible to serve in the army.
